snippet: John Henry and his partners in the Fenway Sports Group, who have won praise for their stewardship of the Boston Red Sox and were seen as saviors when they purchased Liverpool two years ago, now have two famed but struggling teams on their hands.
abstract: John Henry and his partners in the Fenway Sports Group, who have won praise for their stewardship of the Boston Red Sox and were seen as saviors when they purchased Liverpool two years ago, now have two famed but struggling teams on their hands.

headline.main: Henry and Liverpool Try to Right Their Ship
